Items.Title: Application no. 20055009 TCM, pursuant to §20-226 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of 57 Restaurant Associates LLC, to establish, maintain and operate an unenclosed small sidewalk café located at 60 West 57th Street, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 4.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-226(g) of the New York City Administrative Code.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Zoning resolution amendment application no. 050030 ZRM, pursuant to §197-d and §200 of the New York City Charter, concerning changes in the text of the zoning resolution, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 3, relating: to Z.R. section 96-104 (height regulations) within the Preservation Area of the Special Clinton District.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Zoning Reso., Clinton Bulk Regulations, Manhattan (050030ZRM)

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Application no. 20055009 TCM, pursuant to §20-226 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of 57 Restaurant Associates LLC, to establish, maintain and operate an unenclosed small sidewalk café located at 60 West 57th Street, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 4.
